answers.answer: Hi, fatty liver does not cause any changes in stool color, the alteration could be due to the food you consumed. Fatty liver can be due to alcoholism when it is called Alcoholic fatty liver disease and the other one is Non alcoholic fatty liver disease, which is due to obesity, diabetes and high triglyceride levels. Regards.
